event.title: Cloduino (Clojure + Arduino) workshop
event.description:
In this session, Jon Summer will show us how to program Arduino hardware in Clojure using Cloduino:Â  a library that allows you to control Arduino using Clojure, allowing Clojure developers to interface with real world using Arduino hardware: https://nakkaya.com/clodiuno.html

The location will be Small Bar for now, but may change if we get more people than usual scheduled to attend. See you there!
